preparation.step: Cut peel off plantains and cut into 1/2 to 1 inch chunks.
Bring oil (at least 2 inches deep) to 280-300 degrees F.
Fry plantain chunks for about 2 minutes in batches of 6-7.
Drain fried plantain chunks and smash with tostonera to 1/4 inch thickness
Fry flattened plantain chunks for about 2 more minutes in batches of 3-4.
Drain and place tostones on paper towels.
